body:
Day 58 - 1414*
milaady, it is most probably Light since, if I ain't wrong, the other girl is the one that Light made commit suicide so it would be fitting of her being in some kind of Limbo designed by a the new God Light.
I really liked this one, especially who I assume is Light. He was really well drawn.
7/10.
The most accurate doujin so far that what will happen if death note was a hentai
Who is the guy? Light or L?
Man i can't believe no one comment it despite being uploaded in 7 years
